data.title: Meet the Providers – Simpson DermCare and Family Medicine
data.text:
Dr Simpson was born and raised in Idaho Falls. After graduating from Hillcrest High School he completed an Associates Degree at BYU-Idaho. He then went on to earn his BS in Neuroscience from BYU. Dr. Simpson graduated from Medical School at Midwestern University in Glendale, AZ. After completing medical school Dr. Simpson completed a 2 year residency of Family Medicine in Phoenix, AZ. He then went on to complete a 1 year fellowship in Underserved Dermatology through the University of Texas Health Sciences Center in San Antonio, TX. Dr. Simpson has been practicing medicine for over 10 years. He is known and loved for his kind and compassionate bedside manner. Dr. Simpson is passionate about pediatrics, especially when visiting newborn babies in local hospitals. He has been married to his wife Jennifer since 2009, and they have 7 children. When he is not working, he is spending his time with his family enjoying life or working on their farm.

For additional training information and curriculum vitae Click here.

Dayne was born and raised in Firth, Idaho where he graduated from Firth High School. He was an undergrad at BYU-Idaho and then attended Midwestern University in Arizona where completed his Physician Assistant certificate. Dayne has been practicing since 2014. He enjoys taking care of patients in Urgent Care settings and is skilled in dermatology care. Dayne has been married to his wife, Meagan since 2010, and they have 4 children. He enjoys mountain biking, hunting, skiing, and just hanging out with his wife and kids.

Mindy was born in Southern California and later moved to Southeast Idaho as a teen, she graduated from Rigby High School. She was an undergrad at California State University and then received her Masters at Gonzaga University receiving her certificate as a Family Nurse Practitioner. She worked as a nurse for 20 years and has now been a Family Nurse Practitioner for 6 years. She has a very sympathetic heart and cares for patients in mental health and women’s health. Mindy has been married to her husband, Josh since 2001 and they have 3 children. In her spare time, she loves to build, create, sew, and tinker. She also enjoys weight lifting, playing pickleball, and fishing.

Kody was born and raised in Firth, Idaho where he graduated from Firth High School. He was an undergrad at BYU-Idaho and then attended Cleveland State University where he completed his Physician Assistant certificate. He has been practicing for 12 years. He is skilled in dermatology and is very caring and thoughtful in his care, specializing in family medicine. He has been married to his wife, Melissa since 2005 and they have 4 children. Kody loves spending time with his family enjoying the outdoors.

Sarah was born in Salem, Oregon and moved to Ucon, Idaho when she was 10 years old. She graduated from Bonneville High school. She was an undergrad at Idaho State University, then attended Frontier University in Lexington where she received her certificate as a Family Nurse Practitioner. She was a nurse for 11 years prior to becoming a Family Nurse Practitioner in 2021 . Sarah is very thorough, kind, and knowledgeable specializing in neurology and women’s health. She has been married to her husband, Eric since 2010 and they have 3 children. She loves watching her kids play sports, driving them to activities, and enjoys playing in the sun and water. Sarah also loves house plants and baking.
